citation.biblCit: Sampson, Martin; Hilbert, Vi, 2014, "Basket Ogress by Martin Sampson", https://doi.org/10.7939/DVN/10025, UAL Dataverse, V5

stdyInfo.abstract:
-From tape label: M.S. Basket Ogress told in Lush then translated (loosely), MS relates in Lushootseed then summarizes in Eng. He gives us an account of the -spirt- of this witch which as been met by 2 men on different occasions. These sightings brought bad luck. Families of both men died.

-Digitization interrupted around 16 min, during last bit of chatting in English (but recorded as part of -Basket Ogress (Martin Sampson)- BasketOgressI.wav)

-From 2007-101-T-47

useStmt.specPerm: Permission must be granted before access to recordings, transcripts and translations is made possible. Permission can be requested from Dr. David Beck (dbeck@ualberta.ca) or by clicking on the request permission link beside the file download button.
